text: Bayou Costapia is a stream in the U.S. state of Mississippi. It is a tributary to the Biloxi River. Bayou Costapia is a name derived from the Choctaw language purported to mean "fleas are therein". A variant name is "Costapla Creek". ==References== Category:Rivers of Mississippi Category:Bodies of water of Harrison County, Mississippi Category:Bodies of water of Jackson County, Mississippi
title: Bayou Costapia
